href="http://hdl.handle.net/11366/363" />     <author>       <name>J\ufffd\ufffdgerhorn, Martin</name>     </author>     <id>http://hdl.handle.net/11366/363</id>     <updated>2014-12-17T21:30:26Z</updated>     <published>2014-11-12T00:00:00Z</published>     <summary type="text">Titolo: Interoperability: the View from Converis Autori: J\ufffd\ufffdgerhorn, Martin Abstract: The presentation provides a follow-up to the discussion on interoperability across the research lifecycle David Baker (CASRAI), Josh Brown (ORCID) and Ed Simons (euroCRIS) had at the recently held Converis Global User Group event in London, http://tmsnrt.rs/1zZ0nxb. The presentation examines the challenges for implementing this seamless cross-institutional interoperability and provides two case studies based on the Converis-based SweCRIS in Sweden and the research information management system at the Region of Bolzano in Italy. Descrizione: 16 slides.-- Presentation delivered at the Panel discussion with euroCRIS Strategic Partners: "Towards the startup of concrete use cases of cooperation"</summary>     <dc:date>2014-11-12T00:00:00Z</dc:date>   </entry>   <entry>     <title>Introducing Web of Science Profiles</title>     <link rel="alternate" href="http://hdl.handle.net/11366/362" />     <author>       <name>J\ufffd\ufffdgerhorn, Martin</name>     </author>     <id>http://hdl.handle.net/11366/362</id>     <updated>2014-12-17T21:30:20Z</updated>     <published>2014-11-11T00:00:00Z</published>     <summary type="text">Titolo: Introducing Web of Science Profiles Autori: J\ufffd\ufffdgerhorn, Martin Descrizione: 9 slides.-- Presentation delivered at the session: "CRIS developers \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd euroCRIS sponsors session"</summary>     <dc:date>2014-11-11T00:00:00Z</dc:date>   </entry> </feed>
